OrgName.entry: ENDORSEMENT AND QUALITY STANDARDS BOARD FOR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT LEARNING (ENGLAND)

AltName.entry: ENGLAND STANDARDS BOARD FOR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT LEARNING AND QUALIFICATIONS - FORMER NAME

Desc.entry: The endorsing body for all community development work training/learning and qualifications within England. The board endorses all kinds of learning, from non-accredited to accredited and from taster level through to post graduate programmes. Company limited by guarantee no 3505553.
